Pre-Game Insights: The Royals picked up three players: 40-year-old Yuli Gurriel in a Minor League transaction with the Braves, and claimed Robbie Grossman and Tommy Pham on waivers before the September 1st deadline.
Post-Match Reflections: Regularly putting Pham and Grossman at the top of the batting order (Pham against righties; Grossman against lefties) is a step in the right direction and should help the Royals in their quest for a return to the postseason.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals have struggled with their leadoff hitters this season, with a 66 wRC+,.267 wOBA, and.275 OBP, all of which rank last in baseball.
Others: The Royals are on their way to losing seven in a row as they are down 7-1 in the top of the 8th, since Vinnie Pasquantino's thumb injury.
